TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void QueryCursorEventHandler(object sender, QueryCursorEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed QueryCursorEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub QueryCursorEventHandler(sender As Object, e As QueryCursorEventArgs)
public delegate void QueryCursorEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, QueryCursorEventArgs ^ e);
type QueryCursorEventHandler = delegate of obj * QueryCursorEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 和 事件以及 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events, as well as the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托与以下附加事件一起使用。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - 此委托与以下路由事件一起使用。This delegate is used with the following routed events. 这些路由事件转发前面列出的附加事件，使其更易于访问中的常规元素模型 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据，路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For details, see [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview).
